derek-chauvin.name: Derek Chauvin
derek-chauvin.title: Police Officer
derek-chauvin.wiki: Derek Michael Chauvin is an American former police officer involved in the killing of George Floyd in Minneapolis, Minnesota on May 25, 2020. During an arrest made by Chauvin and three other officers, he knelt on George Floyd's neck for seven minutes and 46 seconds while Floyd was handcuffed and lying face down on a street.

george-zimmerman.name: George Zimmerman
george-zimmerman.title: Police Officer
george-zimmerman.wiki: George Michael Zimmerman is an American who fatally shot Trayvon Martin in Sanford, Florida, on February 26, 2012. On July 13, 2013, he was acquitted of all charges in Florida v. George Zimmerman. After his acquittal, Zimmerman himself was the target of a shooting, which resulted in a conviction for attempted murder against the perpetrator.
